verse_no:
ईशा वास्यमिदं सर्वं यत्किञ्च जगत्यां जगत् ।
 तेन त्यक्तेन भुञ्जीथा मा गृधः कस्यस्विद्धनम्‌ ॥
meaning: Meaning:The Lord indwells everything in the universe. Everything that exists is inhabited by the Divine. Therefore, renounce the desire for worldly possessions and enjoy what comes your way without coveting the wealth of others.
